name: ipfs-css
description: The single-purpose css class names and @font-face config to IPFS up your UI.

scripts.build:fonts: mkdir -p fonts; rsync -a --exclude='Inter-Black*' --exclude='Inter-Light*' --exclude='MontserratAlt*' --exclude='Montserrat-Thin*' --exclude='Montserrat-ExtraLight*' --exclude='Montserrat-Black*' --exclude='*.css' --exclude='README*' --exclude='InterDisplay*' --exclude='Inter-Thin*' src/fonts/inter/docs/font-files/ src/fonts/montserrat/fonts/webfonts/ fonts
scripts.build:licenses: cp src/fonts/inter/LICENSE.txt fonts/Inter-LICENSE.txt; cp src/fonts/montserrat/OFL.txt fonts/Montserrat-LICENSE.txt;
scripts.deploy:docs: rsync -aq --delete icons docs/; ipfs add -r -Q docs

author: olizilla
